statements: SELECT user_name, source_location, destination_location FROM ridesharing_data;
SELECT user_id, user_name, ride_date FROM ridesharing_data WHERE ride_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ridesharing_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, available_seats FROM ridesharing_data WHERE available_seats >= 3;
SELECT destination_location, source_location, user_name FROM ridesharing_data ORDER BY destination_location ASC, user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ridesharing_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, ride_date FROM ridesharing_data WHERE source_location = 'City A' ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, destination_location FROM ridesharing_data WHERE available_seats > 0 AND ride_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, source_location, destination_location FROM ridesharing_data WHERE source_location LIKE '%Highway%' AND destination_location LIKE '%Rd';
SELECT DISTINCT user_name FROM ridesharing_data ORDER BY user_name ASC, ride_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY fare DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rides FROM rides WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE ride_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ride_id, origin, destination, fare FROM rides WHERE fare > 50;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE reg_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reg_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.origin, r.destination, r.distance FROM users u JOIN rides r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM rides WHERE ride_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY ride_date ASC, fare DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ride;
SELECT driver_name, car_make, car_model FROM Driver;
SELECT passenger_name, passenger_email FROM Passenger ORDER BY passenger_name ASC;
SELECT ride_id, ride_date, passenger_count, pickup_location, driver_rating FROM Ride ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, car_make, car_model, car_year FROM Driver WHERE car_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM Ride WHERE passenger_count > 2 ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, passenger_phone, passenger_email FROM Passenger WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT driver_name, car_make, car_model FROM Driver WHERE car_year > 2015 ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT ride_date, pickup_location, dropoff_location, driver_rating FROM Ride WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY ride_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, pickup_location, dropoff_location, driver_name FROM Passenger p INNER JOIN Ride r ON p.passenger_id = r.driver_id WHERE ride_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY ride_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT booking_id, ride_id, passenger_id, booking_time FROM bookings WHERE booking_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT driver_id, car_model, destination_city FROM rides ORDER BY departure_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT review_id, passenger_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT ride_id, car_model, departure_city, destination_city FROM rides WHERE remaining_seats > 0;
SELECT passenger_id, booking_time FROM bookings WHERE booking_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ride_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT car_id, brand, model, year FROM Cars WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM Trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT rating_id, trip_id, rating FROM Ratings WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT car_id, brand, model, year FROM Cars ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM Trips WHERE passengers > 2 ORDER BY trip_date ASC;
SELECT rating_id, rating, feedback FROM Ratings WHERE rating >= 4;
